heading: $t(glossary:catalogue)
orderWithBraille_plural: Order graphic on {{count}} sheets swell paper and get image description as ...
orderWithBraille: Order graphic on one sheet of swell paper and get image description as ...
orderWithoutBraille_plural: Order graphic on {{count}} sheets of swell paper
orderWithoutBraille: Order graphic on on sheet of swell paper
variantview_logged-in-hint: Please <%/login log in%> or <%/signup create an account%>, to be able to publish graphics.
variant-edit-hint: Opens the selected variant, e.g. to correct orthographic or content errors or to add an image description.
variant-copy-hint: Opens the variant as a basis for a new variant for this design, e.g. with a different font system or color scheme.
variant-new: … open this variant as an independent draft
variant-new-hint: Opens this variant as the basis for a new, independent draft.
pdf-hint: Contains only graphic pages for self-printing on swell paper.
rtf-hint: Includes image description as visual black font to open in Word, Pages, Open Office or other word processing programs.
brf-hint: Contains Braille code for direct printing with an Index Everest series Braille printer.
zip-hint: An archive file that contains all the files mentioned above.
